scripts.say: It looks like the experimental device was a success.
The short time limit is its main disadvantage, but it is, without a doubt, very effective at enhancing combat power.
With a little more fine tuning, I'll be able to equip my mass-produced "Pieces" with these devices, Holoserver will also fall into my dominion over time and space!
Indeed. This device is proof that you're gradually gaining control of the server. Once you've cleared all the authorizations, the Resistance will no longer pose any threat to you.
That would be wonderful. I'll continue working then. I'll entrust you with the countermeasures.
Meanwhile...
Ahahahaha! HAHahah! Finally... we've finally found it! The Hololive headquarters! Let's go, Hololive Resistance!
Aqua's finally back to her old self.
It's fine to scout things out from the observation deck, but we still have to make our way over to the HQ building.
The lava flow area is expanding... *gasp*! Is this the Sirens' defense system?!
Are the Sirens planning to drown this entire area with magma?
That is a possibility... We won't be able to reach the HQ building without crossing the sea first...
It's like we were playing on creative mode before, but now we're on survival mode!
Everyone! We found lots of TNT blocks on the observatory island!
20 boxes of TNT! Add this to what we already have, and we'd be able to blow away half of the original Holoserver!
Huh? Did something like that happen before...?
What's the matter, Zed? You look deep in thought.
Mm. I'm glad we have a supply of TNT blocks, but how are we going to get them over to the HQ building?
With all this lava being blown around, we won't be able to use our planes, as they won't be able to maintain altitude.
Hmm? In that case, let's use this roller coaster that Shion and I made. We called it, the "MioShio Coaster!"
A few other friends helped with to build it. When the weather is clear, the view from the top is unbelievable.
Ooh, a roller coaster! I've always wanted to ride one with the Commander!
Javelin, take this more seriously! ... The MioShio, huh? Where do I get on this roller coaster?
There should be an entrance near the observation deck! I'll go look for it!
